4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:02): 0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17: there is a lot to do with modernizr actually
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:03): i'm currently exposing a bunch of internal methods
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:03): so that everything can be a plugin through addTest()
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:03): and once that's done
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:03): all the pull requests and such need to be adapted to plugin style
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:03): and then captured on the wiki
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:03): and i'd love your help with that
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (06:04): if only i had the javascript knowledge at the moment :D
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (06:05): i'll save the bits above to a text file just in case though :)

0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (06:05): at the moment
d6d3296db607a0c333973a5a152e0efb (06:11): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049: how is the 2.0 beta splitting the tests up now?
d6d3296db607a0c333973a5a152e0efb (06:12): you say you want all the tests to use addTest, what are they doing now?
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:12): well.. we will continue to have a bunch of tests within modernizer core
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:13): and we will probably reduce the number that ship in core
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:13): but there is like 4x the number in core that are waitin in plugins and such
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:13): liek. Element.dataset and all that
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (06:13): right now there are a bunch of pull requests and forks that are not compaatible as plugins just yet
